body.p: As a result of the Board’s decisions on the service cost and net interest components, the amendments made in 2011 define the remeasurement component as comprising:

li.p: actuarial gains and losses on the defined benefit obligation;
the return on plan assets, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset); and
any changes in the effect of the asset ceiling, excluding the amount included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset).
